mapper.insert: insert into timeline (timeline_name, timeline_no, cate_no, timeline_startdate, timeline_enddate timeline_desc, timeline_amount, timeline_photoname, timeline_photopath, timeline_loc) values (#{timeline_name}, #{timeline_no}, #{cate_no}, #{timeline_startdate}, #{timeline_enddate} #{timeline_desc}, #{timeline_amount}, #{timeline_photoname}, #{timeline_photopath}, #{timeline_loc})
mapper.select:
select t.timeline_no, t.timeline_name, m.mno, m.mni, m.mpho_path, t.timeline_startdate, t.timeline_desc, t.timeline_photopath, t.timeline_loc from timeline t, member m, category c where 1 = 1
and t.cate_no = #{cate_no}
and t.timeline_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and t.cate_no = c.cate_no and c.mno= m.mno order by timeline_name desc limit #{limitNum}, 10
